subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] HELP
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I recommend using a radio thgat is already voltage tunable. The radios used
for the hack boxes have a pin marked "VT", this means tuning voltage, you
can use an external tuning voltage.

 The varactor diodes coming in a great many values and styles, you'd have to
know what you wanted to do with it to be able to use it.

 F-S
